mapper.select: select e.DICTTYPEID DICT_TYPE_ID, max(case when e.DICTID = 'ftp_address' then e.DICTNAME end) FTP_ADDRESS , max(case when e.DICTID = 'ftp_port' then e.DICTNAME else null end) FTP_PORT , max(case when e.DICTID = 'ftp_user' then e.DICTNAME else null end) FTP_USER , max(case when e.DICTID = 'ftp_pwd' then e.DICTNAME else null end) FTP_PWD , max(case when e.DICTID = 'wordpdf_url_rt' then e.DICTNAME else null end) WORD_PDF_URL_RT, max(case when e.DICTID = 'wordpdf_url_xin' then e.DICTNAME else null end) WORD_PDF_URL_XIN from eos_dict_entry e where e.DICTTYPEID='signature_ftp_info_wordpdf' and e.DICTID in ('ftp_address','ftp_port','ftp_user','ftp_pwd','wordpdf_url_rt','wordpdf_url_xin') group by e.DICTTYPEID
